description: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe that can be used to execute any other binary
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: Other tools with the same command line flag combination
Legitimate uses as part of Visual Studio development
name: NodejsTools PressAnyKey Lolbin
query: (((process.command_line.text:*Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe\ normal\ *) OR ((process.command_line.text:*.exe\ normal\ * AND process.command_line.text:*.exe))) AND (NOT process.executable.text:*\\Microsoft\\NodeJsTools\\NodeJsTools*))
